warthamana agawinisuru wariya me wage ka‡∑äramayakin eliyata adala dammoth wruththiya ha aathma gaurawayak thiyena kisima kenek anagathedi ee thanathura sandaha idiripath nowewi.
namuth 13 wana sanshodhanayen palath sabhawalata dun polis balathala kisima nayakayeku ka‡∑äriyathmaka nokale eyin me rata sampurnayenma wyakula wana nisayi.

ehi di ee aayathanaye wyawasthadayaka balathala wenath aayathanayakin ho aayathanawalin ho kisiyam pramanayakin ho nathikara athnam ee rajyaya thawaduratath eekiya rajyayak no weyi. 154(u)(2) anuwyawasthawen janathawage paramadhipathyayehi wyawasthadayaka balaya kriyathmaka kirimata 4(a) anuwyawasthawen parlimenthuwata himi kara athi balaya yam pramanayakin palath sabha wisin nathi keri thibenawa.
